BusinessMilestone.name: BusinessMilestone
BusinessMilestone.description: Represents the milestones of a business, such as acquisition, market listing, and expansion.

ExpirationDate.description: The date when the business milestone expired.

ExpirationDescription.description: The reason why the business milestone expired.

IsExpired.description: Indicates whether the business milestone has expired. The default value is False.

IsTentative.description: Indicates that the exact date of the business milestone is not known. The default value is False.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

MilestoneDate.description: The date on which the business milestone occurred.

MilestoneDescription.description: The description of the business milestone.

MilestoneSiteId.description: The location where the business milestone occurred. For example, the location where a business deal was won.

MilestoneType.description: The type of the business milestone.

Name.description: An auto-generated number assigned to this record.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the record owner.

PrimaryAccountId.description: The primary business account this business milestone is related to.

SourceSystem.description: The name of the source system this record was obtained from.

SourceSystemIdentifier.description: The ID of this record in the source system. This field is unique within your organization.
